author: Thomas
content:
I'll have to bring my trusty Canon 17-55 mm/2,8 to the repairshop pretty soon. Your post(s) seem to attest to my fears: how will I survive without it? A quick statistics tells me that I do around 85% of my photos with it.

Nice, colorful bike! Looks a bit psychedelic with all that pink, but it certainly gets your attention... ðŸ˜‰
